casebody.data:
Bertholf, Appellant, v. Carr, Respondent. (Supreme Court, General Term, First Department. March 14, 1890.) Reargument of appeal from order denying to appellant the fees of a referee on the reference of a claim against the executor. Por former report, see 6 N. Y. Supp. 254.

Argued before Van Brunt, P. J., and Brady and Daniels, JJ.

John Townshend, for appellant. Van Brunt, P. J.

The case of Larkins v. Maxon, 103 N. Y. 680, 9 N. E. Rep. 56, disposes of the questions involved in this appeal in favor of the appellant. The order should be reversed, with $10 costs and disbursements, and the motion granted. All concur.
